No. 10.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the address of the official home of the British Prime Minister
No. 10.translation[1].definitions[0].def: Number 10 Downing Street in London; the official home of the British prime minister, and used to talk generally about his or her decisions and activities
No. 10.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: An announcement from No. 10 is expected later today.
